name: African Elephant 51
description: The African elephant is the largest land mammal, known for its intelligence and strong social bonds.
funFacts: Elephants can recognize themselves in a mirror.
They communicate using infrasound.
They can live up to 70 years.

name: Lion 52
description: Lions are social big cats living in prides, often called the 'king of the jungle'.
funFacts: Male lions have a mane to protect their neck.
They can roar up to 8 km away.
Lions sleep up to 20 hours per day.
